stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.


Answer all parts of the question that follows.

a) Identify ONE specific development related to economic globalization in the period circa 1945–2000.

b) Explain ONE way in which multinational corporations or transnational economic organizations increased interactions on a global scale in the period circa 1945–2000.

c) Explain ONE way in which economic interactions between world regions were limited during the period circa 1945–2000.
